Reviews.Title: Sony Zoom digital camera
Reviews.Author: MaCellery
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my new Sony cyber-shot Compact Zoom digital camera!!  So easy to convert to still pictures, video or panarama!  Colors are great!

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Jeff Minor
Reviews.Content: Haven't had much time to explore all the options with this camera but it seems to be a good one.

Reviews.Title: GOOD ONE
Reviews.Author: Swatantra K.
Reviews.Content: This fulfill my requirement , good product to have, complete your day to day requirement, small size , easy to handle

Reviews.Title: performance is not so good
Reviews.Author: Lavanya
Reviews.Content: slow in capturing and getting display of the photos taken.Calrity is also not good when compared with canon of same specifications.

Reviews.Title: A convenient, small camera
Reviews.Author: Art Sloan "Art S."
Reviews.Content: This is a nice-looking compact camera that you can carry with you at all times if you want to, so it's ready to take a picture as circumstances warrant.

Reviews.Title: Zoom
Reviews.Author: Terry Blakemore
Reviews.Content: Is not sufficient to meet my needs.  Otherwise, good camera, quick photo, much faster than my older Sony.  But old Sony has 25 X zoom, this one 8X
